APP_VERSION_INFO.REPORTING_MESSAGE: Taflatse gblɔ nusiwo gblẽ la na

SECTIONS.CONTENT_1: Míexɔ wò nyuie ɖe Map of Pi dɔwɔnua me, si Map of Pi ƒe ƒuƒoƒoa wɔ le nuwɔwɔ aduadu kple Pi Habɔbɔa me. Ameŋunyatakakawo Ŋuti Ðoɖo sia gblɔ alesi míeƒoa wò nyatakakawo nu ƒu, zãa wo, ɖea wo fiana, eye míekpɔa wo ta ne èzã míaƒe asitelefon dzi dɔwɔnua.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_1: Ne èŋlɔ ŋkɔ abe zãla ene la, míate ŋu aƒo wò ŋkɔ, e-mail adrɛs, zãla ƒe ŋkɔ, kple nyatakaka bubu siwo sɔ nu ƒu.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_2: Míate ŋu aƒo nyatakakawo nu ƒu tso wò mɔ̃a ŋu, siwo dometɔ aɖewoe nye mɔ̃a ƒe ƒomevi, dɔwɔɖoɖo, kple mɔ̃a ƒe dzesidenu tɔxɛwo.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_1: Woate ŋu abia tso nudzrala siwo ŋlɔ ŋkɔ ɖe mɔ̃a dzi si be woana Nudzrala ŋuti nyatakakawo, siwo dometɔ aɖewoe nye Nudzrala ƒe ŋkɔ, teƒe si wòle, kple kadodo ŋuti nyatakakawo.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_2: Nudzrala ate ŋu anye asitsala alo ame ŋutɔ tɔ.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_1_1: Míezãa wò nyatakakawo tsɔ naa Map of Pi app ƒe dɔwɔnawo eye míedoa wo ɖe ŋgɔ, siwo dome zãla kple Nudzrala ƒe dɔwɔwɔwo hã le.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_2_1: Míate ŋu azã wò kadodo ŋuti nyatakakawo atsɔ aɖo nyatakaka yeyewo, nyatakakawo, kple boblododo gbedasi siwo ku ɖe Map of Pi dɔwɔnua ŋu ɖe wò.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_3_1: Míeƒoa nyatakakawo nu ƒu hedzroa wo me be míana dɔwɔnua ƒe dɔwɔwɔ, eƒe nɔnɔmewo, kple eƒe dɔwɔwɔ nanyo ɖe edzi.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1_1: Woate ŋu ama zãla ŋuti nyatakakawo kple Nudzralawo hena nudɔdɔa dzi wɔwɔ kple kadodo ƒe taɖodzinuwo.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_2_1: Míate ŋu ama nyatakakawo kple ame bubuwo ƒe dɔwɔƒewo hena dɔwɔnua ƒe dɔwɔwɔ, numekuku, kple fexexe ŋuti dɔwɔwɔ.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: Míewɔa dedienɔnɔ ƒe ɖoɖo siwo sɔ ɖe dɔwɔƒewo nu tsɔ kpɔa wò nyatakakawo ta. Gake mɔnu aɖeke si dzi woato aɖo wo to internet alo elektrɔnikmɔ̃ dzi nudzraɖoƒe dzi mele dedie keŋkeŋ o.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: Àte ŋu awɔ wò akɔntabubu ŋuti nyatakakawo yeyee to dɔwɔnua ƒe ɖoɖowo dzi. Àte ŋu atutu wò Map of Pi akɔnta to wò Pi Network akɔnta tutu me eye emegbe nàtia tiatia si nye be nàtutu wò Map of Pi nyatakakawo ne ègage ɖe Map of Pi me ake. Àte ŋu atiae. tso boblododo kadodowo me.
SECTIONS.HEADER_7: Tɔtrɔwo le Ameŋunyatakakawo Ŋuti Ðoɖo Sia Ŋu
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: Míate ŋu atrɔ asi le Ameŋunyatakakawo Ŋuti Ðoɖo sia ŋu ne ehiã. Woada eƒe tata yeyetɔ ɖe míaƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒea alo dɔwɔnua me.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_8_1: Ne nya aɖe le asiwò alo nètsi dzi ɖe Ameŋunyatakakawo Ŋuti Ðoɖo sia ŋu la, taflatse te ɖe mía ŋu to e-mail ɖoɖo ɖe

SECTIONS.CONTENT_1_1: Míexɔ wò nyuie ɖe Map of Pi dɔwɔnua me, si Map of Pi ƒe ƒuƒoƒoa wɔ le nuwɔwɔ aduadu kple Pi Habɔbɔa me. Ne èzã dɔwɔnu sia la, efia be èlɔ̃ ɖe edzi be yeawɔ ɖe Dɔwɔɖoɖo siawo dzi, kpakple míaƒe Ameŋunyatakakawo Ŋuti Ðoɖo dzi.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1: Èlɔ̃ be yeazã Map of Pi dɔwɔnua le ɖekawɔwɔ me kple se kple ɖoɖo siwo katã li.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2: Mègazã dɔwɔnua na taɖodzinu aɖeke si mele se nu o alo si ŋu wode se ɖo o, alo le mɔ aɖeke nu si ate ŋu agblẽ nu le dɔwɔnua ŋu, awɔe nuwɔametɔe, awɔ agba wòagbɔ eme, alo agblẽ nu le eŋu o.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_3: Be nàzã Map of Pi la, ele be nàŋlɔ ŋkɔ abe Pi Network zãla mɔɖela ene.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_1: Map of Pi ƒe dɔwɔnua kple emenyawo, nɔnɔmewo, kple dɔwɔwɔwo katã nye Map of Pi tɔ eye wokpɔ eta to nutata ƒe gomenɔamesi, asitsadzesi, kple nunya ƒe nunɔamesiwo ŋuti se bubuwo me.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1: Map of Pi aɖe wò kpe gbe siwo dze, eye siwoɖeka nɔ, nu, mɛkpɔkpɔ, eye aɖeka me ɖeka kple nɔwo eye siwo ɖeka le Nudɔ Map of Pi.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: Megbetɔwo ɖe ƒe aloɖaɖa kple keke Mɔ Map of Pi kple me ɖeɖea ɖeka kple nyate, nɔ, mɛkpɔkpɔ, eye kple ɖe aloɖaɖa kple nɔ mekplewo (keke la me ɖeɖeaɖea siwo be ɖeɖeaɖea ɖeka kple nɔme).
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: Nudɔ ƒe ƒe alokpe sia kple gake le gbe siwo aŋutsɔ lawo kple nɔ ɖe Nɛtɔɖo kple wia bebe le Ingland kple Wales be amegbetɔwo ɖe kpe.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: Mee aɖe alo alo ƒe alokpe sia kple ɖe alo ŋkpe alo alo aŋutsɔ tso le ɖe.

SHARED.CONFIRM_DELETE: Míe nya dzɔ aɖe be woanɔ anyi sia dzi nyuie? Woate ŋu kɔ woanɔ anyiŋú gɔme o.
